text: The Anglo-American was an English motor tricycle produced by a York company from 1899 to 1900. The company also offered motors that it claimed were "manufactured throughout in our own works", but which were most likely Continental imports. ==See also== *List of car manufacturers of the United Kingdom Category:Vehicles introduced in 1899 Category:1899 establishments in England Category:1900 disestablishments in England Category:Companies based in York Category:Defunct companies based in Yorkshire Category:Defunct motor vehicle manufacturers of England Category:Motorized tricycles Category:Veteran vehicles Category:British companies established in 1899 Category:British companies disestablished in 1900
title: Anglo-American (motor tricycle)
